title: Marrikkar Mohamed Thahir to fill vacant SJB National List MP seat
byline: The Samagi Jana Balawegaya has decided to nominate Naina Thambi Marrikkar Mohamed Thahir to fill the vacancy created in Parliament following the resignation of Muhammathu Ismail Muththu Muhammathu last week.

title: Resettlement of families and restoration of damaged infrastructure must be treated as national priority – PM Harini
byline: The resettlement of affected families, the provision of essential relief, and the restoration of disaster-damaged infrastructure must be treated as national priorities, Prime Minister Dr. Harini Amarasuriya.

title: Nearly 390,000 water supply connections yet to be restored
byline: A total of 387,964 domestic water supply connections that were disrupted due to landslides and flooding in recent days, have not been restored thus far.

title: Kaduwela–Battaramulla road which was closed due to flooding reopens
byline: The road from Kaduwela to Battaramulla, which had been closed due to the recent flooding, has been reopened for travel.

title: Showers or thundershowers expected in several provinces after 2pm
byline: Showers or thundershowers may occur at several places in Northern, North-Central and Eastern provinces and in Badulla and Matale districts after 2.00 p.m.

title: Gazette issued declaring 22 districts as national disaster affected areas
byline: A gazette extraordinary has been issued declaring 22 districts as “National Disaster Affected Areas.”
